column2: Hi! If you have any concerns or questions about graduation. Feel free to ask Gradbot.
Hi! If you have any concerns or questions about graduation. Feel free to ask Gradbot.

The process for applying to gradition are:

First - go Student Portal. Here is the link https://tinyurl.com/LSPUSCCmyAccount.
Second - Login in the Old Student Portal.
Third - Click the Application for Graduation tab. Fill-out the form and submit.
